meanings.definition: Divided or connected by a hyphen.
meanings.sent1: The hyphenated words were easy to read.
meanings.sent2: The document had many hyphenated terms.
meanings.sent3: I found a hyphenated joke in the book.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were hyphenated, making them clear.
meanings.sent5: The hyphenated lines guided my reading smoothly.

meanings.definition: Written with a hyphen between the parts of a compound word.
meanings.sent1: The hyphenated word was easy to understand.
meanings.sent2: She always used hyphenated phrases in her writing.
meanings.sent3: The hyphenated title caught my attention.
meanings.sent4: His speech was hyphenated with pauses for effect.
meanings.sent5: The hyphenated compound word stood out on the page.
